name: Suzi's Pumpkin Squares

other.name: Crust
ul: 1 pkg yellow cake mix (minus 1 cup used for topping)
ol: Prepare crust and press into a 9"x13" cake pan.

other.name: Filling
ol: Prepare filling and pour over crust.

other.name: Topping
ol: Sprinkle the topping over the filling

instructions: Prepare crust, filling, and topping in a 9" x 13" pan
